title: The Claiming of Sophia, the Sheltered Angel of Wisdom
description: This is a very erotic story of the Claiming of Sophia, the Sheltered but Arrogant Angel of Wisdom who falls into sinful and lustful darkness as a result of her journeys through the Realm of the Mishra. Sophia encounters several very masterful and horny creatures who take control of her sweet and innocent angel body and force her to submit to waves of unending sexual pleasure. Explicit, sex story with elements of dubious consent, hypnosis/trance, sleep sex, monster sex, tentacle sex, facials, dominant male, submissive female, forced lactation, fisting, anal, BDSM, erotica, and spanking.
author: Bella Swann
